title: Slow though but it is Samsung brand has inherent VALUE
content: Color awesome Screen awesome Processing not at PAR with any competitors in this range, I am sorry, very slow speed. RAM has no value, my 2gb laptop 15 years old is very speed Value for Money no, depends, I trust on reliability It is for my elderly Mom , harldy she uses WhatsApp, So This was my choice. Big screen,  nice rigid flip covers available , screenprotector , I have all safe guards. Note 8 was my Samusung mobile, not even single times, it has any fault in four years of service I fell in love, I upgraded to Note 20 Ultra, Awaiting for Samsung Note 23 Ultra, if upgrade makes sense, they I will definitely upgrade. My love for Samsung is unlimited, when it comes it S pen. Anyways, long story , but truly inclined, Choose wisely Overall my MOM is happy, So I guess I made a very right choice. Thanks Samsung n Amazon Thanks for all who read this, as well. My bad, I am an author so mention, a big comprehensions
